nodes.text: Talus was a Human male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He fought to defend the Republic's Adegan crystal reserves in the Republic crystal refinery on Ilum during the Battle of Ilum, but was slain.
Master Talus is a named enemy who must be defeated to secure a store of green Adegan crystals in "A New Order," an Imperial mission on Ilum in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
